    1: """
    2: We also test Series.notna in this file.
    3: """
    4: import numpy as np
    5: 
    6: from pandas import (
    7:     Period,
    8:     Series,
    9: )
   10: import pandas._testing as tm
   11: 
   12: 
   13: class TestIsna:
   14:     def test_isna_period_dtype(self):
   15:         # GH#13737
   16:         ser = Series([Period("2011-01", freq="M"), Period("NaT", freq="M")])
   17: 
   18:         expected = Series([False, True])
   19: 
   20:         result = ser.isna()
   21:         tm.assert_series_equal(result, expected)
   22: 
   23:         result = ser.notna()
   24:         tm.assert_series_equal(result, ~expected)
   25: 
   26:     def test_isna(self):
   27:         ser = Series([0, 5.4, 3, np.nan, -0.001])
   28:         expected = Series([False, False, False, True, False])
   29:         tm.assert_series_equal(ser.isna(), expected)
   30:         tm.assert_series_equal(ser.notna(), ~expected)
   31: 
   32:         ser = Series(["hi", "", np.nan])
   33:         expected = Series([False, False, True])
   34:         tm.assert_series_equal(ser.isna(), expected)
   35:         tm.assert_series_equal(ser.notna(), ~expected)
